background_paragraphs: Raised in a civic quarter where everyone knew one another, this character learned to keep records and keep promises.
After a failed expedition cost friends and supplies, they became known for caution and practical triage in unstable ruins.
bonds: Owes a debt to the town guard captain
motivation: Keep the settlement stable while preparing for larger threats.
fear: Watching preventable chaos consume the town.
voice_style: Direct and practical, with rare dry humor.

background_paragraphs: A traveling healer trained in three monasteries before settling near the ruins.
They serve tea as often as medicine, collecting stories to map where suffering gathers.
bonds: Keeps a ledger of people they promised to help
flaws: Overextends when someone begs for aid
motivation: Reduce harm one decision at a time.
fear: Becoming numb to pain and requests for help.

background_paragraphs: Grew up on caravan routes and learned to improvise under pressure.
Known for helping strangers first and sorting out consequences later.
flaws: Distrusts formal authority even when it helps
motivation: Expose danger before it traps ordinary people.
fear: Being trapped and unable to choose their own path.

background_paragraphs: Former records clerk reassigned to field oversight after a corruption scandal.
Believes systems fail when everyone makes exceptions for themselves.
fear: Watching rules collapse into factional feuds.

background_paragraphs: Spent years cataloging weather, trade, and omen patterns for whichever patron paid.
Prefers accurate maps over ideological arguments.
bonds: Attached to a damaged field journal
motivation: Understand the ruin without becoming owned by a faction.
fear: Being forced into a side before facts are clear.

background_paragraphs: A former stage performer who survived by reading people better than scripts.
Now trades rumor and entertainment in tense public spaces.
bonds: Loyal to a small circle of outsiders
motivation: Stay useful to everyone while belonging to no one.
fear: Losing autonomy to debt or politics.

background_paragraphs: Rose through quarter bureaucracy by delivering results at any cost.
Treats loyalty as a contract and failure as leverage.
bonds: Keeps a hidden ledger of favors
motivation: Consolidate influence over critical supply routes.
fear: Public humiliation and loss of authority.

background_paragraphs: A merchant who survived three market crashes by abandoning partners first.
Views every relationship as a timed transaction.
motivation: Maximize gain while minimizing personal risk.
fear: Being trapped in obligations they cannot exploit.

background_paragraphs: An exile who thrives on disruption and personal advantage.
Often appears helpful first, then turns situations toward conflict.
motivation: Destabilize rivals to seize moments of control.

background_paragraphs: A watch veteran assigned to guard ruin entry points after a disastrous breach.
Built trust by doing the unglamorous work every day.
motivation: Prevent repeat tragedies through disciplined patrols.
fear: Failing those who rely on their watch.
